xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/701743-Anacondas 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zBqUapVFQJ9VkeL5WIIq2KZlY4S.jpg Inspired by the chronicle "Anacondas in the Park" by Pedro Lemebel. A experiment with time, image and montage to formulate an observational narrative in a park in Guadalajara, Mexico, when the night falls it comes back to life and the bodies meet like snakes. A dialogue with a common past of criminalization and homosexual repression in Latin America. Anacondas
